Key Arguments: The government should not be the sole arbiter of truth.
There has been government censorship of medical experts and the public who disagree with the official narrative.
Society needs protection from government overreach and influence by financially motivated lobbyists.
Granting the government more power could lead to an Orwellian dystopia.
Notable Quotes: The words 'Safe and Effective' pushed by every Government mouth should still be ringing in peoples ears.
Society does not need to be told what can and can't be discussed in the town square.
Past Government actions must serve as a warning, to allow this overreach of power would be marching blindfolded into an Orwellian dystopia.
